item.title: About me
item.author: dbolella@gmail.com (Danny Bolella)
item.description:
My name is Danny Bolella. I’m a Developer/Scrum Master who just wants to do what I love! And coding is one of those things.

So to keep track, I made this new blog. Besides being my initials, the DB in ‘theDB’ dedicates this site to storing some of my notes. Though it’s primarily a way to keep track of my madness, I hope that it can also help other coders out there, possibly even you!

my history

To be honest, I’m having some trouble remembering right now, so why don’t you just watch my movie and it will answer all your questions.
